content.description:
CHINA GDP GROWTH

Source: Bloomberg News, 2017.
content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the trend in the graph between 2005 and 2009?

choices.label: The GDP growth rate increased then sharply declined.
The GDP growth rate had almost no fluctuation during the time period.
The GDP growth rate remained constant then gradually declined.
The GDP growth rate rapidly decreased then gradually increased.

content.answer: The GDP growth rate increased then sharply declined.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
